none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on April 18, 2022 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Nasty rock 'n roll tinged USHC shooting straight and fast out of the end of the last decade. Seven minutes of swagger and blast and speed picking that sounds like a lost NardCore relic...flying real real low under the radar. Close enough that you can feel the exhaust from the bass solo in "Kayfare."CCDDRR
